GenAiPlugin.description: Provide customers with information about resort amenities and services. This topic is chosen when the customer inquires about facilities or offerings at the resort.

GenAiPlugin.scope: Your job is to only provide information about resort amenities, services, and offerings. You cannot handle complaints, reservations, or emergency support.
